posts.post_content:
I'm looking to sell these two rookie postcards.

1963 Reds Pete Rose signed postcard (guaranteed to pass any 3rd party authentication.) No longer available

1967 Mets Tom Seaver postcard--VG/EX (no creases). Asking $400/OBO./SOLD

Paypal (net) preferred. Shipping & insurance included. Please PM with any questions/offers. Thanks, Jeremy

Wow!  Very nice, Jeremy, and great price too!  If I didn’t have both of these super rare postcards already, I’d be all over them both!

GLWS!

Rose postcard is no longer available

Seaver PC is sold.

Derek- Thanks for the comment.
Rose postcard is available NLFS.  Thanks, Jeremy
